document_data.name: ''Shylo's Slicer''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Shylo's Slicer''''' was an intelligent [[shortsword]] in the possession of [[Hogan Underwood]], who once used the alias of Shylo Slick.{{cite book/Desert of Desolation|65}}
document_data.Powers: ''Shylo's Slicer'' was not just a very powerful [[sword]]. It could ''teleport'' up to 600 pounds once per day, and it detected when passages sloped. It was also more than fairly intelligent.
